item.title: News24.com | Notorious arms dealer urges Trump to seek refuge in Russia
item.description: Russian arms dealer Viktor Bout, freed from a US jail last year, on Friday urged US ex-president Donald Trump to seek refuge in Russia as his life was "in peril".

item.title: News24.com | J&J to pay R162bn to settle baby powder-cancer lawsuits
item.description: Johnson & Johnson said it agreed to pay $8.9 billion (R162 billion) to resolve all cancer lawsuits tied to its talc-based powders.

item.title: News24.com | China sends warships and aircraft around Taiwan for second day
item.description: China sent warships and aircraft near Taiwan for a second day on Friday, Taipei said, after President Tsai Ing-wen angered Beijing by meeting with US House Speaker Kevin McCarthy.

item.title: News24.com | Philippines holds bloody crucifixions, whippings on Good Friday
item.description: Catholic zealots were nailed to wooden crosses while others whipped their backs bloody and raw in gruesome displays of religious devotion on Good Friday in the Philippines.

item.title: News24.com | King Charles III's coronation: What we know with one month to go
item.description: With around a month until King Charles III's coronation, plans are at an advanced stage to mark his historic accession to the throne - Britain's first in seven decades.

item.title: News24.com | Australian police seek pair seen with platypus on train
item.description: Forget the Hollywood thriller 'Snakes on a Plane', two commuters in Australia have dished up a platypus on a train.

item.title: News24.com | Earth had its second-warmest March on record, EU climate monitor says
item.description: Earth had its second-warmest March on record with Antarctic sea ice shrinking to its second-lowest extent, the EU's climate monitoring agency said on Thursday.

item.title: News24.com | Google and Amazon struggle to lay off workers in Europe
item.description: After announcing the largest rounds of layoffs in their history, US big tech companies are now learning how difficult it is to reduce headcount in Europe.

item.title: News24.com | Former Italian PM Silvio Berlusconi diagnosed with leukaemia
item.description: Four-time Italian prime minister Silvio Berlusconi has been diagnosed with leukaemia, a source close to the matter said on Thursday, a day after he was admitted to intensive care with breathing problems.

item.title: News24.com | Spanish TV star uses dead son's sperm to conceive granddaughter via surrogate
item.description: A Spanish actor said her newly adopted daughter was conceived using her dead son's frozen sperm. This news sparked a debate in Spain about using surrogates.

item.title: News24.com | Donald Trump charged, but conviction is no slam dunk
item.description: The historic case against Donald Trump faces a number of legal hurdles if it is to result in the first conviction of a US president on criminal charges, legal experts said on Wednesday.

item.title: News24.com | Joe Biden announces First Lady Jill will represent US at King Charles III's coronation
item.description: President Joe Biden on Tuesday congratulated Britain's new King Charles III and said First Lady Jill Biden would attend the upcoming coronation, the White House said.

item.title: News24.com | Historic drought adds to Argentina's economic woes
item.description: Argentina's already fragile economy is now taking a beating from nature, as the worst drought in almost 100 years decimates critical soy, wheat and corn production.

item.title: News24.com | US talks show Taiwan 'not isolated', says its President Tsai after talks China said must not happen
item.description: US House Speaker Kevin McCarthy welcomed Taiwan's president in California on Wednesday, in a meeting she said reassured the island's people they were "not isolated" in the face of rising Chinese anger.

item.title: News24.com | Defamation, election tampering, US Capitol attack: Donald Trump's (other) legal troubles
item.description: New York prosecutors took a historic step last Thursday by filing criminal charges against Donald Trump, the first time this has happened to a former US president.

item.title: News24.com | WATCH | After Italy blocked access to ChatGPT, will the rest of Europe follow?
item.description: Italy has become the first Western country to block ChatGPT and the country's data protection watchdog said it's opening an investigation against OpenAI, the company behind the massively popular chatbot.

item.title: News24.com | Four children killed in hatchet attack at Brazil preschool
item.description: A 25-year-old attacker invaded a preschool in southern Brazil and killed four children Wednesday with an axe-like weapon before turning himself in to police, authorities said.

item.title: News24.com | WATCH | Jacinda Ardern bids farewell to New Zealand parliament in tearful address
item.description: All New Zealanders should feel politics can be a home for them, former Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern said on Wednesday, in a final address to parliament after leading the nation through the Covid-19 pandemic and a terror attack in Christchurch.

item.title: News24.com | Clashes as Israeli police enter Jerusalem's Al-Aqsa mosque
item.description: Clashes erupted inside the Al-Aqsa mosque in Jerusalem early on Wednesday as Israeli police said they had entered to dislodge 'agitators', a move denounced as an 'unprecedented crime' by the Palestinian Islamist movement Hamas.

item.title: News24.com | Scotland's ruling party rocked by arrest of former leader Nicola Sturgeon's husband
item.description: Scotland's ruling party faced fresh turmoil after the husband of its former leader Nicola Sturgeon was arrested as part of a police investigation into financial irregularities.
